action.description: The committee on CPC recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 6 Ayes: Representative(s) Matayoshi, Chun, Kong, Marten, Tam; Ayes with reservations: Representative(s) Iwamoto;  Noes: none; and 4 Excused: Representative(s) Ilagan, Ichiyama, Lowen, Pierick.
